verses.verse: Now <S%H310>after<s%> <S%H3651>this<s%> it came to <S%H1961>pass,<s%> that <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H5221>smote<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H6430>Philistines,<s%> and <S%H3665>subdued<s%> them, and <S%H3947>took<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H1661>Gath<s%> and her <S%H1323>towns<s%> out of the <S%H4480>hand<s%> <S%H3027><s%> of the <S%H6430>Philistines.<s%>

And <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H5221>smote<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H1928>Hadarezer<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H6678>Zobah<s%> unto <S%H2574>Hamath,<s%> as he <S%H1980>went<s%> to <S%H5324>establish<s%> his <S%H3027>dominion<s%> by the <S%H5104>river<s%> <S%H6578>Euphrates.<s%>

And <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H3920>took<s%> <S%H4480>from<s%> him a <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H7393>chariots,<s%> and <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H6571>horsemen,<s%> and <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H376>footmen:<s%> <S%H7273><s%> <S%H1732>David<s%> also <S%H6131>hamstrung<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H7393>chariot<s%> horses, but <S%H3498>reserved<s%> <S%H4480>of<s%> them a <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H7393>chariots.<s%>

And when the <S%H758>Syrians<s%> of <S%H1834>Damascus<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> to <S%H5826>help<s%> <S%H1928>Hadarezer<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H6678>Zobah,<s%> <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H5221>slew<s%> of the <S%H758>Syrians<s%> <S%H8147>two<s%> and <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H376>men.<s%>

Then <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H7760>put<s%> garrisons in <S%H758>Syria-damascus;<s%> <S%H1834><s%> and the <S%H758>Syrians<s%> <S%H1961>became<s%> <S%H1732>David's<s%> <S%H5650>servants,<s%> and <S%H5375>brought<s%> <S%H4503>gifts.<s%> Thus the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H3467>preserved<s%> <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H3605>whithersoever<s%> <S%H834><s%> he <S%H1980>went.<s%>

And <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H7982>shields<s%> of <S%H2091>gold<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> <S%H1961>were<s%> <S%H5921>on<s%> the <S%H5650>servants<s%> of <S%H1928>Hadarezer,<s%> and <S%H935>brought<s%> them to <S%H3389>Jerusalem.<s%>

Likewise from <S%H4480>Tibhath,<s%> <S%H2880><s%> and from <S%H4480>Chun,<s%> <S%H3560><s%> <S%H5892>cities<s%> of <S%H1928>Hadarezer,<s%> <S%H3947>brought<s%> <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H3966>very<s%> <S%H7227>much<s%> <S%H5178>brass,<s%> wherewith <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> <S%H6213>made<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H5178>brazen<s%> <S%H3220>sea,<s%> and the <S%H5982>pillars,<s%> and the <S%H3627>vessels<s%> of <S%H5178>brass.<s%>

Now when <S%H8583>Tou<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H2574>Hamath<s%> <S%H8085>heard<s%> <S%H3588>how<s%> <S%H1732>David<s%> had <S%H5221>smitten<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H2428>host<s%> of <S%H1928>Hadarezer<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H6678>Zobah;<s%>

He <S%H7971>sent<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H1913>Hadoram<s%> his <S%H1121>son<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H1732>David,<s%> to <S%H7592>inquire<s%> of his <S%H7965>welfare,<s%> and to <S%H1288>congratulate<s%> him, <S%H5921>because<s%> <S%H834><s%> he had <S%H3898>fought<s%> against <S%H1928>Hadarezer,<s%> and <S%H5221>smitten<s%> him; <S%H3588>(for<s%> <S%H1928>Hadarezer<s%> had <S%H1961>war<s%> <S%H376><s%> <S%H4421><s%> with <S%H8583>Tou;)<s%> and with him all <S%H3605>manner<s%> of <S%H3627>vessels<s%> of <S%H2091>gold<s%> and <S%H3701>silver<s%> and <S%H5178>brass.<s%>

Them <S%H1571>also<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H6942>dedicated<s%> unto the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> <S%H5973>with<s%> the <S%H3701>silver<s%> and the <S%H2091>gold<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> he <S%H5375>brought<s%> from <S%H4480>all<s%> <S%H3605><s%> these <S%H1471>nations;<s%> from <S%H4480>Edom,<s%> <S%H123><s%> and from <S%H4480>Moab,<s%> <S%H4124><s%> and from the <S%H4480>children<s%> <S%H1121><s%> of <S%H5983>Ammon,<s%> and from the <S%H4480>Philistines,<s%> <S%H6430><s%> and from <S%H4480>Amalek.<s%> <S%H6002><s%>

Moreover <S%H52>Abishai<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H6870>Zeruiah<s%> <S%H5221>slew<s%> <S%H853><s%> of the <S%H123>Edomites<s%> in the <S%H1516>valley<s%> of <S%H4417>salt<s%> <S%H8083>eighteen<s%> <S%H6240><s%> <S%H505>thousand.<s%>

And he <S%H7760>put<s%> <S%H5333>garrisons<s%> in <S%H123>Edom;<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H123>Edomites<s%> <S%H1961>became<s%> <S%H1732>David's<s%> <S%H5650>servants.<s%> Thus the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H3467>preserved<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H3605>whithersoever<s%> <S%H834><s%> he <S%H1980>went.<s%>

And <S%H3097>Joab<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H6870>Zeruiah<s%> was <S%H5921>over<s%> the <S%H6635>host;<s%> and <S%H3092>Jehoshaphat<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H286>Ahilud,<s%> <S%H2142>recorder.<s%>

And <S%H6659>Zadok<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H285>Ahitub,<s%> and <S%H40>Abimelech<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H54>Abiathar,<s%> were the <S%H3548>priests;<s%> and <S%H7798>Shavsha<s%> was <S%H5608>scribe;<s%>

And <S%H1141>Benaiah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3111>Jehoiada<s%> was <S%H5921>over<s%> the <S%H3774>Cherethites<s%> and the <S%H6432>Pelethites;<s%> and the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H1732>David<s%> were <S%H7223>chief<s%> <S%H3027>about<s%> the <S%H4428>king.<s%>
